title: Bust of Isis
description:
Fragment of a faience figure of the goddess Isis made of a pale greenish-blue glazed faience. The goddess is crowned with the hieroglyph of the throne. If complete the goddess would have been seen to be nursing the child Horus. 
Condition: Horus and lower part of figure missing.
section: The Late Period through the Beginning of the Roman Occupation

museum_location.name: 19th Dynasty to Roman Period, Martha A. and Robert S. Rubin Gallery, 3rd Floor
